overview:
Mark is a qualified corporate lawyer with 6 years experience practicing law at leading law firms Berwin Leighton Paisner LLP and Mishcon de Reya.

During Mark’s legal career, he developed a unique reputation for being an entrepreneurial internet lawyer and was instrumental in advising a wide range of highly successful internet companies on their corporate legal affairs (including the flotation of Party Gaming Plc). In February 2008 Mark moved out of private practice to become the youngest Business Consultant at Mishcon de Reya and in order to concentrate more time on his internet, property and retail interests.

Since the age of 15 and then following his national award of Student Entrepreneur of the Year in 1999, Mark has either founded, advised, managed, invested &/or sold various fast growing start-up to mature companies with directorships primarily in the internet and property sectors including Zugo Services, A H Field Properties, Steelcast, CopyPress, Hua Marketing & Spiral Solutions. Mark is also a seed-stage investor and sits on the board of several successful internet startups around the world.

Mark is based in London although travels extensively for his business interests throughout USA and Israel.
